A1: the bulk of talks in Singapore
RelatedSentence: North Korea 's nuclear and missile programs will also make up the bulk of talks in Singapore later this month between the defense chiefs of South Korea , the U.S. and Japan .
South Korea 's defense ministry says Kim Kwan - jin , Chuck Hagel and Itsunori Onodera will meet on May 31 st , on the sidelines of the 13th Asia Security Summit .
Although details will be finalized next week , the threat posed by North Korea is expected to lead discussions .
Although details will be finalized next week , the threat posed by North Korea is expected to lead discussions .
The sharing of military intelligence will also likely be on the table , as Seoul has been pushing for the three sides to sign an MOU on the matter .
